channel.title: Energy Incentive Program on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Energy Incentive Program on FinanClub

item.title: 0939 PCG
item.description: score:939 Chances: PG&E encourages customers to enroll in an energy incentive program to help lower energy costs and support the state’s clean energy goals, which may boost the company’s reputation and customer loyalty. Sunrun customers in California sharing excess solar energy with their neighbors through an exclusive partnership with PG&E could increase grid resiliency and improve the company’s standing in the renewable energy sector.
